meanings.sent1: The upshifted car zoomed down the road.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic recommended an upshifted transmission for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The upshifted bicycle raced past the others with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her upshifted energy propelled her through the marathon.
meanings.sent5: The upshifted engine roared as it accelerated on the highway.

meanings.definition: Moved to a higher position or level.
meanings.sent1: The upshifted employee was promoted to a managerial role.
meanings.sent2: The upshifted prices made it difficult for people to afford homes.
meanings.sent3: The upshifted balloon soared high into the sky, carried by the wind.
meanings.sent4: His upshifted status in the company brought new responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The upshifted elevator took them to the penthouse suite with a view.
